author: Predeactor
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any data about users in a persistent way, but provides all properties of one or more members of a guild when requested. When possible, these information are deleted after being viewed, but can be requested anytime.
install_msg:
Thank for installing `MyMembers`. Check out commands with `[p]mymembers`.
Please, do not forget to respect member's privacy.
